title: Products - duagon
content: At duagon we supply complete application system solutions and rugged embedded electronics for railway, medical and other industrial and critical applications.Â  Our innovative products are designed to the highest standards of safety and reliability, helping our customers accelerate their technology roadmaps and achieve optimal cost of ownership.
Robust and reliable network devices from the communication and control technology experts
Fully customizable embedded electronics made for mission-critical rail and medical computers
duagon offers a suite of I/O products, including rugged remote I/O modules and programmable controllers with inbuilt I/O capabilities.
Find the perfect product for your specific application by searching the database or browsing through our product categories and functions using the product finder below.
For additional help and support, please contact your nearest duagon service department.
